title: "{{title}}"
authors: "{{authorString}}"

## Notes citing this source:
```dataview
table file.cday as "Created", file.mday as "Last modified"
where contains(this.file.inlinks, file.link) 
	  and !contains(this.file.outlinks, file.link)
sort file.cday
```
